cwd
===
> Return the current working directory.

<!-- <usage> -->
## Usage

``` javascript
var cwd = require( '@stdlib/utils/cwd' );
```

#### cwd()

Returns the current working directory.

``` javascript
var dir = cwd();
// returns '/path/to/current/working/directory'
```
<!-- </usage> -->

<!-- <examples> -->
## Examples

``` javascript
var path = require( 'path' );
var cwd = require( '@stdlib/utils/cwd' );

var parts = cwd().split( path.sep );
console.log( parts );
```
<!-- </examples> -->
